-No gambling.
-Players that care about the game and not about stupidly expensive skins.

-No 8 years old kids describing how they were in your moms bed.

-No 8 years old kids crying about how they lost their skins by betting.
-No bad parents sueing VALVe because their stupid kids lost their money online because of gambling.
-No one wants to scam your in-game items.
-No cyka blyat.
